solution_line_template: Each class uses {sheets_per_class_per_day} x {school_days_per_week} = <<{sheets_per_class_per_day}*{school_days_per_week}={sheets_per_class_per_week}>>{sheets_per_class_per_week} sheets of paper in a week.
Thus, there are {total_sheets_per_week}/{sheets_per_class_per_week} = <<{total_sheets_per_week}/{sheets_per_class_per_week}={number_of_classes}>>{number_of_classes} classes in the school.
